biotools.summary:
GPU-accelerated mesh-based Monte Carlo photon transport simulations.

===============================================================================.

= Mesh-based Monte Carlo (MMC) =.

= Supporting both OpenCL and Multi-threading with SSE4 =.

A GPU-accelerated photon transport simulator.

Download v2019.4 or Nightly-build.

"mmc -L" or "mmclab('gpuinfo')" to list).

Designing MATLAB-streamlined MC-based analysis using MCXLAB and MMCLAB.
